lead_paragraph: REID--William, great father, grandfather, and great-grandfather. Born in Dundee, Scotland, July 7, 1923. Died May 23, 2016. World War II Veteran. He was a great putter and had a wonderful sense of humor. Survived by his son Anthony (Tawnya), three grandchildren, one great-grandson and one sister. He will be sorely missed. 1/3
